column1: So far so good!   Working good and showing correct info. The UI and especially the round widget looks really beautiful. I have a request. *EDIT: Thanks for listening to my request to add default clock in "tap on clock" option from settings* 5 stars here.       Thank you for considering the request, hope this beautiful app will never be bloated in future. Thank you :)

GulfJet Graphics 5 Stars, accuracy 2 stars. You report SNOW BLIZZARD where is NONE. The temperature is off most of the time. It's a pity. Take a close look at your Wx provider. I do like the program, but it should deliver the Wx as accurate as possible. Kind regards .... Well, the program still reported "Snow Blizzard" with a Outside Temp. 06 C. I live on the south side of the Jura mountain at 840 meters in Switzerland, maybe this helps a bit. Graphics 5 Stars

After downloading this app I found that you have deducted an extra amount of Rs. 50/-  from my account. First an amount of Rs.10/- deducted and after few minutes again an amount of Rs.50/- was deducted. Why this cheating from the customer?
These app suks The worst app I've ever purchased why does the widget not working when i put a widget on the home screen theres no weather coming out pls. Fix these ok

Weather Live Apalon app Great weather app for Android. Like the layout & ability to see weather in many places all together in one place. (iOS app can show a temperature graph for the day but this one doesn't). A very good app even though forecast is out sometimes!
No. Hate the red clouds background when skies are grey during day time. Please add a grey clouds background and remove that hideous red cloud apocalypse garbage.  It makes cloudy days worse.
Fairly accurate most the time unlike like the other weather apps I'm currently running two separate apps on my phone for weather and this one is definitely better and more accurate.

Best weather application! This is a great application for all weather enthusiasts. The best one I have used with up to date reports as well as a beautiful widget choice for all likes. I  would highly recommend this application to anybody looking for a very informative and great working weather application.

Galaxy S5 City is always changing. I'm 8 hrs from Minneapolis, MN but I got their weather. I thought it was something I was doing wrong. The information is inaccurate outside of 15 degrees.  I would not suggest this app.  Especially don't buy until you're sure, but that's with everthing. Good luck
Seems better Than when posted last year so increased rating.  Could do with some more widget styles and also when click on clock should take you straight to clock not the app for you to click again
Great! Great app! Attractive interface, accurate forecasts... What more could you want!
Great app Accurate, looks good on the whole, forecast too small.  Would be good to show location in the widget.

Pretty, but useless. The app and widget do not work correctly if you have a battery saver or anti-virus installed. This was told to me by their own customer support. Why should I have to turn off my battery saver to use their program?  There are plenty of free options out there. I feel like I am owed a refund. Stay away.
Good looking and accurate The widget does look very sophisticate and it is very precise with the information that displays. Love it
accurate and beautiful wonderful app. worth the money

So Simple,  yet so much. This app is a very simple one to use,  but has a lot of widgets.  I love it,  with its nice layout,  and simple design. The images change according to the weather and time of day. Worth the $0.99

Good... but could be Great My biggest problem with it is the live weather wallpaper is not current with the weather i am having ..I have to restart my galaxy s7 to get accurate wallpaper.  Also it does not list the town where I live it picks up a city 4 towns away thats the weather i  have to go by. The style is very good and i like the widgets but still needs improvements ..
Looking forward to use this app I've used the free version and I wasn't disappointed. Now it's time to put the live wallpaper to the test.

memory hog, leaks My S5 was unresponsive so I found that live wallpaper was consuming 500MB RAM. Removed that, but using widget still was consuming around 250MB. I uninstalled it for now. Please mem profile and fix :-)

Add a Future Radar Cast & I'll love it Beautiful layout and look. The accuracy is great too. There is a lot going for this app. It's well worth the price for the full features. Unfortunately I have had to keep a second weather app because a major feature is missing. I took a star off because there is no future radar cast. That is a feature that would increase the rating to 5 stars for me. Hopefully that can be added in a future update soon. I'd love to only have one weather app that does it all!
Mr Chris Reeve A very good app can't really fault it . Does the job

Not as good as I thought. What is with it only updating every 30 mins???? Temps & weather changes faster than that. The graphics don't keep up either obviously. Why can't it be every 10 mins like the rest?? Wish I hadn't bought the full version, otherwise I would uninstall. Don't like wasting money
Junk Detailed forecasts are worthless when the app can't get he location correct.
nice widget the one I was looking for.well how to add all the parameter default only 4 are there

Disappointed The app like to show the extremely wrong weather conditions suchlike heavy snow in my location for 2 days already. Really like the widget but please fix the accuracy. I'm in Staaken Berlin Germany by the way.
Great app! Clean user interface. Accurate and easy to use. Keep up the great work devs.

Great app Love this app. The devs are really quick to respond and are very helpful. The 'full' version on Amazon underground carries ads for Amazon (a full version with ads?)  which cause it to crash. Get the *proper* full version here.
So far so good Not long installed app , hopefully it holds up.
Great for weather I use this app every day sometimes multiple times
Sitting in a virtual monsoon should've brought a coat!...freezing rain, has been all day ..But not according to you. From Chester, Cheshire
Good App Wanted a good looking widget that displays hourly weather and time, this worked great
I really like this app I wish there was a way to change the front page of the app itself.
Why only 3 stars ? I've only given 3 stars because it looks amazing but the weather info is very inaccurate. Maybe a good idea if we could choose who the info came from. Like some other apps.
Says "network error occurred" but my Internet is fine. Such a disappointment for a pretty app. Update: Reboot worked! Thanks!
It does the job Have it on my Nvidia Shield, so far so good
Good little app Does what's expected.  Good graphics.
Seems good So far so good. But a bit inaccurate

Good, solid app! It's not as customizable as my last free app, but it's got more important features like barometric pressure, rain totals, etc. I also haven't seen any ads yet which is totally worth a buck!!

Missing important information I live in an extremely hot and sunny area, I was hoping this app would have the max daily UV index in it so I could prepare myself, otherwise it's a great app. Hope to see this feature soon.
Not bad Lovely design, temp is good. Really good looking widget.

Looks great but stopped working Really love it. But now it simply stopped working. It is just stuck on a black background not changing or moving or anything. I keep having to restart it. Sort of pointless to do that for a background. Nexus 6p.

Great concept, but could have been done better in my opinion. You can only choose from a few layouts, all of which consist of pretty much the same few objects, shifted around. It would be nice to be able to choose from 2 or 3 sets of shapes instead of being stuck to a flower that's petals shift around. The app's setting also seem confusing. It would be helpful to see explanations for what some of the sliders do.
Worth the money This has to be 1 of the coolest live wallpapers on the market works flawlessly on my LG G4 it is awesome lots of customisation

Beautiful Performance on Note 4 Lollipop Brilliant, realtime camera adaptation is magnificent to behold in this wallpaper. Going into the wallpaper's settings lets you adjust how often the camera refreshes, how often the layout animates, and how quickly it animates. Frankly, the out-of-the-box settings are so visually enticing that you may want to tone them down so that you can actually do whatever it was you wanted to do on your device! Well done, dev. Certainly worth three times the price.
Very cool app I love this app. I'm showing it off all the time. This is a terrific way to personalize your phone.
Awesome Awesome is the word to describe this app. It needs improvement in adapting the exact color, but still I'll give it a 5 star.

Love it Only one thing frustrates me. PLEASE ADD AN OPTION TO DISABLE DOUPLE TAP TO REFRESH OR TO DISABLE THE USE OF THE CAMERA COMPLETELY. Whenever I swipe through my screens the layout and colors change, and this frustrates me because it's using the camera which means more battery wasted. The last two refresh options say "no camera" but this isn't true for either of them because the camera is still used if it registers a double tap, even if it's just from swiping through your screens. 4 stars until then.
Doesn't work with Nova launcher S6 Says "Application not installed"

My favorite wallpaper app I like this for a number of reasons. It follows the Material Design theme. It's customizable. My icons and widgets are fully visible over the wallpaper. Also it doesn't seem to drain battery from my s6 Active.
Yep. Beautiful app Looks amazingly cool on my note 4.
Amazing but the camera is portrait. Please make it to real camera settings
Worked for about 3 month It just stop working. I kind of regret spending my money on it now.
Nice, but uses too much processor and battery
Wow This it a pretty unique LWP. A+
Nice It's the first time I buy a lwp love it
Chmeleleon Wow! This is a got a have it NOW!!!!
Bug Too many bugs on zenfone 2
The Best
This app doesn't work properly on s4 waste of money
Wow Just wow
Refund my money Crashing in my phone. Kindly refund my money.
great idea buuuuut... it doesn't work very well on my s4 gti9500
Nearly 5* But realtime not working
beautiful . nice idea and well done.

Plus one Works great. Still get some crashes, if I launch an app while it's still changing.  For a request, I'd like to be able to save a color scheme. Maybe a triple tap. Also, an option for two finger tap, so it doesn't change colors when I open a shutter in action launcher.  Thanks!
Best Lwp In The World Please add 20 more layout or color add option to choose manual color to every part
I will give a 4 star when force close stops on my nexus 6
It actually works ! It works exactly as listed. I have had some minor crashing errors, but once I disabled the changing of the pattern by touching it helped.
Thank you    The update fixed all the crashes I was having on my note 4
Amazing but Please fix settings, can't read anything. Just big and bold squares as the words and letters (still happening after reset)
Nice Very nice amazing
What a unique and neat idea!  Curious to see what it does to the battery life though.
Its very awasome amazing
Unique app It's impress my friends a lot

LG G4 Probably the most unusual live wallpapers out there but a great one works well so 5*,is there a way of locking in a colour scheme you like, updated i can't use double tap as it locks my G4 screen and i just get a black screen instead?, I dont want my camera on all the time because of battery drain!

One of the more original wallpaper apps OK, first off KEVIN CHAN - Your mom is gimmicky. That's barely even an actual word, you degenerate reprobate. Questionable permissions. Seriously. The NSA don't care about you. You're just another insignificant tool. OUTSTANDING APP. EASILY WORTH THE MODEST FEE. As an enthusiastic personalization app purchaser, I try and buy (and refund) a lot of apps every week and this one definitely ranks in my top 5 of 2015. Good work, Dev. Now, time to spread the word...
I just hope the double tap option can manage to minimize the battrey usage, great app.

Novel idea! I'll use it from time to time but I'll return to my solid black  wallpaper for daily use (I'm very battery conscious). But I do like  it. Imagine the fun once technology discovers/invents an unlimited power source. Cool app.

Beautiful Work as advertised. I Like it. But there is conflict with double tap on LG G2 because double tapping is lock screen. Please find workaround because I don't want to waste battery. Thanks for the cool product
Very original Nice work. Unfortunately it does take a lot of battery...still love to show it off...

Cool looking and elegant I love the look of these live wallpapers, there are some great customisation options and amazing themes to start you off. I've not used this long enough to comment on the battery but it would have to eat my battery life for me to ditch such a fantastic looking app.

Problems on Note 4 with Exynos and higher resolution Upvote so they fix it. Poor framerate on the Galaxy Note 4 with Exynos. Maybe it's not optimized for Exynos yet? It used to run very smoothly on my Note 3 with snapdragon. I absolutely love this app but please fix it!

Only one thing I'd improve It's a great app and great value. The wallpapers are beautiful and you can change them at will or make your own. Only thing I'd improve are the editing tools. Color tools are a bit strange and editing can be a bit clunky, but I've seen way worse and they are definitely usable if you spend a little time.

Shaky hand effect I love this wallpaper and it really brings pretty wallpapers to the home screen, but there's one thing that bothers me a bit and could improve - I like the quick movement of objects when I move my phone, but a shaky hand and/or small movement will make everything jitter in an ugly fashion. Maybe a dampening factor could be applied to the initial movement to remove the shaky hand jitters from the wallpaper? This way the objects won't jitter, quiver, and/or shake as I'm holding the phone :)

Awesome. On a QHD screen the sheer quality of these wallpapers has to be SEEN, very impressive wallpapers and very powerful editing, a little fiddly to use but the results I achieved....are for me amazing.... account sync across devices has been a brilliant blessing, cos editing really needs a large screen. The randomizer is superb, and running my own design's through Muzei with the colours changing every 30 second's brilliant.
Unstable tilt effect The tilt effect is gone after a while. No matter what I do, I can't bring it back. Only by restarting the phone it will works again. Please fix it
GREAT! Lock screen? Is there a way to use this and make a lock screen wallpaper? This is an amazig app and I loce it but I really want to have one for my lock screen
Great live wallpaper On moving to a Samsung S7 Edge found the tilt effect is very jerky, even when set to say less than 14%. Not down rating as the app is still superb even with this bug.
Went ahead and bought the app. This is exactly what I wanted for wallpapers and it only costs a $1?! No brainier! Amazing app!
Clocks? Great wallpapers! Where can I find the clocks featured on the photos? Do I download a specific app for them or?

Live is cool again! I have gotten away from live wallpapers since the Gingerbread days because of the performance hit. I love the accelerometer-driven parallax effect and tons of Material themes to pick from. So far, no performance issues

Doesn't stay on screen Samsung S6, it will allow me to set the wallpaper and all is good until phone goes in standby,  when you wake the phone it has reset itself to the default wallpaper. Kind of useless.

Bought for support. The free version already had the theme I was going to use. Had to buy the pro to support the devs. This app is absolutely amazing, only feature I can think of that could be added is the ability to vote themes and organize them by rating, usage, views etc.
cool cool but the color menu is completly f*ked up impossible to do things properly

A no brainer Installed the free version, used it for a couple of hours and just fell in love with this app. Its the best wallpaper app, period. And the pro version options are just incredible. Thanks dev!
Omg.. I love it.. But How to get that clock as shown in image 1?

Beautiful theme but always disappeared when cleaning recent app. Beautiful theme but always disappeared when cleaning recent apps. Its useless if the wallpaper can't always stick. Too late for refund. :-(

Fantastic Material Design Background App It has many default designs, which you can customize in many great ways including animation and color. If those aren't enough there's an easy way to make your own and also a way to find more online.
Love this app!! If you enjoy beautiful wallpapers and love the parallax effects on live wallpapers the get this app now!
Play time   Create best live wallpaper unlimited creativity.
Fantastic Would love if we could also use images on the layers as well.

Optimization problem Ironically it lags even more when I lowered the graphic settings. I can clearly see the lag it brings to the UI when I pulled down my notification bar, the frames suddenly drops down from 60fps to 15-20. It's the only live wallpaper that lags on my phone.
Looks dope on the Note 5 Dope dope and dope..well worth the purchase

Good with the limited resources we get I expected now when I first came across the app. I expected regular wallpapers can be vectorised and made into 3d parallax form. I even paid for the full app. However, we have to adjust with only lines and circles and use our ingenuity. Would give 5*s for implementing my request.
Great Amazing wallpapers. One bug: if you turn the phone beyond the wallpapers capability, instead of stopping it crashes the homescreen.
The Best Live Wallpaper Collection This is the best app for live wallpapers I've ever used. It complements material design, and very original!
Suggestion Adding the option to add a blur overlay would be nice
Best live wallpaper Highly customizable ! Elegant and clean, worth it
Beautiful Sort of a mind job to realize how powerful the editing tool is!
I need new words in English We have to find new words in dictionary to define and explain an best app like this. (Best)^infinity
Cool Great live wallpaper
Idea is good, but keeps freezing. Uninstalled.
Wallpapers are awesome.. ..but it slows down my Moto G3. Please fix this problem.
Superb Why there are few ratings for such a  nice app. Just brilliant.. Day by day it's improving. It does what it say.
Its a pain to edit walls, but they do look great.
Prefect Been looking for something like this!
Phenomenonal This is all you'll ever need from a live  (or even static) wallpaper app
Pleasing to the eye Wonderfully done. I love the designs.
Best wallpaper app on the market Absolutely stunning.
Joko does it again.   Love the parallax / shift effect.  This seems to run much smoother than Light Grid Pro, which is also a great LWP.
Compass doesn't work on lenovo Looks great but the compass doesn't move with direction on my lenovo which is the only reason I purchased.

I Love it THE ONLY LIVE WALLPAPER I WILL USE. I HAVE A LG VOLT AND MY SD-CARD INFO ALSO IS NOT RIGHT. BUT IT IS THE BEST INFO APP.....UPDATE AS OF 12/21/15 I NOW SEE MY SD-CARD. AND ALL I DID WAS PLAY AROUND IN SETTING FOR A FEW MIN,S. WHEN I DID PAY FOR THE FULL APP. I HAD PLAYED WITH IT FOR DAYS. DID TO SO MUCH YOU CAN DO WITH IT TO MAKE IT YOUR OWN.
One very annoying problem Would you fix the SD card storage display already! It's been months and kinda getting sick of it. Other than that I love it. Will re rate when problem is fixed
Samsung galaxy ph&tab Tried the free then paid for this version, worth the small price, fixed landscape thank you, custom background would be great.
Not entirely working on Lg g3 SD card showing : Unmounted, Colour Background isn't changing, I have something washed out definitely not like in the descriptions.
Except the external SD card info on an Asus Zenfone 2 ZE551ML is wrong. It's going off the emulators space in the internal memory. Not the external one.
Good Little App Having more edit options and screen colors in the full version is nice. But the compass still isn't working. Please fix for more stars. LGL16C.

Great LWP!  :)  but...... Overall, this lwp is very useful and with good looks to match too. But whenever i select the option for blank pages, the status boxes disappear completely, I can't see where they went. Device is Samsung S6. Apart from that, great job dev! :)

They only wallpaper I ever paid for cuz it's so good... A friend of mine found this... I was instantly hooked. I've been using it for over a year... I usually live by the phrase "If it ain't free, it ain't for me." But this wallpaper app.....it was an exception. I love it! I've had many people ask me about it....And many iPhone owners who wish they could have it...lol
Has Sd card status issue fo my asus zenpad i paid fo this. Will be waiting fo tha fix, pls dont take long.
Great but.... Please allow use of custom background or at least solid black as a color choice.
Undetected External SD on the Asus Zenfone 2 Would just like to suggest more SD card directories such as /storage/MicroSD/ or something like that.
Great app. loved i!! Great app. Had it once before and loved it getting the upgrade Whoo-Hoo!
Doesn't work with ZenFone 2 I still can't get set sd card info to show. I know the path, but there's no way to select it.

Great Background Of course while not super important to have ones phones live HW monitoring as a background it can be useful. Has always performed well for me. While it does use more battery than a normal wallpaper, the optimization developed does limit battery suckage.

Nice Wallpaper Main issue is that the storage card directory can't be properly pointed to Eg /storage/extSdCard. Only other thing I'd say is to add an option for putting a picture under the text for those of us who aren't using the entire area of the wallpaper. Other than that, it's probably the best device info wallpaper out there
Satisfying Exactly what you expect if the picture caught your eye
Love it. Needs daydream would give it six stars if possible.
Not so great Text type is unappealing; kinda blurry. SD card function does not function. Color choices are basic and limited. I can make a simple widget that does it all correctly.
This is cool!!! o: I like this app, it shows how the phone and system runs. (: 5      !!! (:
cute works like a ziggy phone but no voice
Brilliant I love this app! But why can't we choose the text color for each info panel. I want CPU text white and RAM text green.
Compass works! Just what I needed useful information live WP w Low Battery drain! The apps welcome line could be replaced with GPS info, local weather or alerts.
Compas doesn't work
Waste of time and money.  Caused my device to reboot constantly.  Avoid at all costs.
Do not work on any model phone Bad app
Why i can't change the color !!!!

Excellent This is by far my favorite  wallpaper. My only problem is I paid for the one with more customization but it wouldn't change to the 12 hour clock and while trying I managed to lose the wallpaper altogether and now can' get it back. I have tried everything
Ex info Sweet.
Perfect! Very cool!
Cool! I recommend!
Best
G Love
great!
Great But one problem on my lg g4 I can't choose background colour
Yeah I'm a picky  user but I do enjoy this app. Good coding behind it. Thanks.
Special live wallpaper
Loved it A nice app
Ram not displaying *fixed Ram is only showing a blank space,  my phone is a OnePlus One, I'll update my rating once it's fixed. *update - ram displays now, awesome, thanks.
Awesome Awesome have brought the pro version and love it use it all the time, the info it desplays is so useful especially to do with temp of battery and drain on battery. Definitely recommend.
6.0.1 update Galaxy S6 Buggy since the last update. Most of the time shows a blue led color. The color changes to the right color when the screen is turned on once.
Good Isnt 100% reliable, but it doesn't detract from the experience and I would still recommend it. Very useful.

Must Have App! I've been using this app for as long as I can remember. When I get a new phone it's one of the first apps I set up. With my custom notifications set up, I can instantly tell what types of notification I've received without even picking up my phone.

I am giving this 5 Stars but also warning of a shortcoming on it. I use Lightflow for custom vibrations on Smartwatches, and to also remove the ability for notifications content to show up on the watch.So all I get is  the custom vibration I set for each type of alert and I can tell what type of notification it is without looking. this works great with android wear watches.   The shortcoming is in the Garmin brand watches I have recently switched over to Fenix 3 HR and Garmin connect supports being notified of notifications from 3rd party's so i thought "AWESOME" just add lightflow to garmin connect app so garmin listens for lightflow notifications. However its not that simple. I cant get lightflow to work with garmin watches at all for notification vibs being sent to wearables.  Despite that I LOVE this product I really do extremely useful for modifying how alerts hit you for notifications. I cant tell you how many times Lightflow has stopped me from pulling my phone out because of custom alerts and knowing the notification was not important based on the vib profile.  TO THE DEVELOPER:You get notifications working with Garmin wearables, I will buy a 2nd LF all over to support you.

Stopped working Since it didn't work on xperia z3 with 5.1.1 I has lg g4,  it worked fine. Now works flawlessly on S6 Edge without suggested workaround.  Changed rating from 3 to 5 accordingly. For those showing only blue led use workaround
Issues with Galaxy S6/S6 Edge since 5.1.1 update. Dev is looking into it.
Long time user on all device Recently picked up the S7 edge and it unfortunately does not work. Rating 3 stars as been perfect on other devices. Please update to bring us the support to our s7 series
I've been using this app for years and loved it, but I just got a new Samsung Galaxy S7 and can't get it to work in any way on it.

Does not work properly on Samsung S7. Shows all the right colors but still flashes led in sleep mode.  If switched to Samsung workaround lights wont flash in sleep mode, but notification icons persist upon reading a message.
Works Works well on my devices unfortunately this version does not yet work on Samsung Galaxy S7 with screen always on. Would recommend.

Continuous Updates,  super FAST support!! 100% absolutely the most valuable Android app I have ever found and my device would be lost without it. Continuous Updates ensure support for the newest devices and apps. This is a MUST have app for every Android user!
Fantastic It was about time I bought this app. This was one of the first things I scrambled to install after getting a new phone. Its usefulness is unending. Thanks for making this wonderful app!

Great if you can get it to work Didn't work reliably on my Galaxy S6- I finally (after hours of tinkering and researching) got it working for maybe a day and a reboot seemed to negate the win. Doesn't work on my G5. Not the apps fault per se, but I also don't want to spend hours trying to set up an app meant to save me time and guesswork.
I love this app, I bought it years ago and they still helped me today when I had a problem with my new phone.   I cannot recommend this app enough.

... One of the best apps I've used over the past few years...  Until now!  Just upgraded to the Samsung Galaxy S7 edge and now the app is no good.  Will do the sounds but the led light will not work the colours I want.  Really hacked off to be honest :(
It messes up with my notifications too much, I had to uninstall doesn't work well on marshmallow.
Light Flow has been on both my phone and tablet for three years, at least  ,and I love it!

Handcent Like the app so far, bought the paid version. Can't seem to get hancent to work. Took a while to set the app up but it's nice when you take the time to configure everything. Will give better rating if I can figure out hancent.

Some stuff needs fixing in the Nexus 6P All of the options work for the app notifications but there are some weird bugs with the app regarding the Nexus 6P. In both the legacy and full version the screen lights up too often randomly as if someone touched the phone. I checked several times and it only happens when the app is enabled. Also, the notification sound sounds twice and overlaps. I haven't figured out how to change that. I had used this app in previous devices but I find these bugs annoying for the Nexus 6P.

Control! Thanks for control that the apps don't provide over the colors and sounds. Now my LED colors match the app icon color so that I know what update I've got, and the sounds do too (instagram=shutter click, twitter=bird chirp, etc.). Great app!

Doesn't work properly with Textra It's a solid app however it doesn't work well with Textra rather than the normal Messenger app. Would be nice to have this fixed. When I have the conversation opened it still flashes even though the notification has been cleared.
Doesn't work on Nexus 5 with the latest update Hangouts doesn't even blink or do anything when I get a message.
Does not work since software update This was a great app but since the android software update last week it no longer works correctly. When will this be fixed?
Not working on Samsung note 5 6.01 Hangouts does not send a LED indication.. all other apps work..
Fixed! There's a bug regarding the charge settings - after the recent update, my LED won't turn off on charge despite ticking this feature. This is still the best notification light app though.
I like it. 5 stars when Google manages to fix the ambient display issue on nexus devices. I'll just turn off ambient display for now.

No longer works for my Google Apps Gmail account and the labels I have in it.  Works for my personal Gmail still, just not my Google Apps account.  I can't even add the notification.  I choose the account, but it doesn't show up in my notification list in Light Flow.

Love,  but broken on Note 4 Marshmallow update Since my Samsung note 4 forced me to take the Marshmallow upgrade, some notifications just don't work. The red light I use with Nine shows up fine, but Hangouts or SMS are always a blinking blue light no matter what my settings are. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app and made sure it had all the needed permissions and I still see this behavior. I'd make this a 5 star if this was fixed.
Become useless on galaxy s7 Erratic control of led. Needs to be rebuilt for marshmallow. Suddenly stops working. Gets stuck. Workaround or not it's not working.
Love this app but it barely works on my S7 Edge. Did all of the workarounds but it's still pretty sketchy. Hopefully the bugs get worked out.
it doesn't work for some odd reason no notification light on my phone.

Been using Light Flow for at least 6 years love it. The only issues I have are because of Samsung and Android. I would recommend it to anyone even with the glitches. Hopefully Samsung will fix their issues so Reactle can have an App that works 100% again. Hats off to Reactle with trying to keep up with updating the App.
makes my phone lag I'm getting lots of messages that lightflow is slowing my device...  uninstalled and it was much faster and smoother...  will try to install again
Works great on my S6 Edge! Unfortunately I need to enable the Samsung workaround, with the non-clearing notification side effect.
Can't work in Android 7.0 Please solve it.

Used it for years, great app and never had any problems with it. Only one little thing: I don't know when this stopped working, but facebook messenger notifications always use the general settings. Contact specific settings don't seem to work.

Disappointed I have this application for over 5 years... Maybe I am one of a few people who firstly bought it...but after the marshmallow update on my s5 I am not pleased at all.. I don't get light notified for many applications that I have on my phone. Pleaseeee fix it
Pointless Ever since my phone update the apps not worked at all. Annoying after having to pay for it, can it be refunded?? Or fixed??
Good for nothing. Purchased it mainly for alerting Missed Calls. Unfortunately it never gets notified on my Nexus 6p. Until the developer fixes this issue, it's a waste.

Not Working Properly After 6.0.1 Marshmallow update in my Galaxy Note 4 its not working properly. I also downloaded the Legency version but after some time its not working. Everytime i need to do uninstall and then again reinstall. Please fix this problem. I'm using this app from long time.

Magical Eye Candy [Update 2016; Was really hoping that by now there'd be an option to use a custom wallpaper with the effects....]   Just bought the full version, I'm in love with the colors and was shocked by the wide range of settings. This will be my wallpaper for a long time.

This is a very good Launcher, though time consuming to set up and with poor documentation.   At  12 it is expensive for an Android app, but not bad value for money for an app that is in use every day  I'd give it 5 stars apart from the fact that is does not hold separate configurations for Landscape and Portrait modes. On my Samsung tablet, I use it equally in either orientation, and although set up and working well in portrait mode, switching to landscape sees the icons all over the place. Other launchers in the past have been capable of applying a different setting between the 2 modes. Hopefully something the developers might consider.

This launcher is freakin awesome!! I love this launcher. I can basically create my own themes. With my Note5 and Sketchbook app, i can DRAW my own icons!! My Note5 looks like a totally customized phone. I use the 2D version for this. 3D is ok, but not as cool as the fully customizable 2D version. I bought a google play gift card with a bestbuy gift card. Totally worth the price. Really!!!! RUNS SMOOOOOTH!!!

I really like the look and feel of this app. Love the "3D" aspect. But...  Are the developers done creating themes?  The current selection is nice, but they're getting stale.  Also, the 2-for-1 themes (launcher and lock screen) won't allow application unless you have Go Locker installed. Locker's nice, but, dear Lord is it a battery hog. The current setup means I have to install Locker, apply the theme I want for the launcher, then disable the Locker portion. I'd say "you get what you pay for", but Next is the most expensive launcher I've seen  Until the above issues are remedied, I won't be able to recommend this app to anyone. Especially not at this price point.

Hopelessly, Happily, Hooked! I've never actually reviewed an app before. In spite of several years of bouncing between launchers using five different devices I always find myself coming back to Next and I've never once required tech support !           It's just a great package at a reasonable price offering a huge variety of experiences, high quality graphics, user friendly format, & emense fun factor.  An all around hard act to follow!                                     Great products deserve recognition!

Best ever wallpaper! THESE DON'T SMELL FISHY I've always loved going fishing . Catch and release fishing . And... I've always found Koi Fish fascinating and beautiful . I would advise fish lovers to have this app along with anyone else . Kids ,people who landscape, ect.

Great live wallpaper. I did not realize that the Koi fish would be swimming under the icons on my screen. I thought it was just a screensaver. I guess that's what the live wallpaper means. YAY! So happy to see this old favorite available for my android. Only one problem: when I had it in the past it cycled through the day/night cycle correctly, but now it's out of sync. Absolutely Exceptional Where do I start!? First off, what is cooler than having a koi pond as your wallpaper!?!? In this app, you can choose from 9 different koi fish, change environmental backdrops, decorate the pond with flowers and lily pads, make it rain and...I kidd you not...have your wallpaper...change times depending on the time of day. I could even size the koi fish however I wanted and customize the backdrops and colors of the times of day. You can even make ripples in the water as if you were actually touching it! Despite the slight bad quality of some of the environment backdrops, this Koi live Wallpaper was exceptional! Definitely worth the $0.99...

I Live in the desert - I really love the lightning in this Wall Paper It rains only about 10 days out of the year where I live, and normally I don't miss the rain.  However, this app is pretty realistic looking (I turned off the blowing rain and just set it to have rain drops show up on the camera lens). We have "heat" lightning where we live, so this app looks really similar (the lightning patterns are definitely very random).  Paid App has many adjustable settings such as daylight / dawn / dusk / night-time light levels, numbers of clouds, and rain or no rain.  Lightning flashes can be set to random colors, and they can be set to flash where you touch the screen (I turned the latter off).  For me (and I'm cheap), the $0.99 was well worth it.

I am a huge fan of space, planets, galaxies, black holes and all the like, so it is not surprising that this live wallpaper caught my interest. What is surprising is that it managed to blow my (high) expectations out of the water. Its visuals are quite simply the best I have seen in Google Play Store, with many galaxies being so absorbing that you don't really want to use your phone but just stare at the background...  The customization is good enough, with many different presets that can also be randomized and a lot of visual options to choose from. It is also worth noting that you can set an automatic timer for a background switch, which is nice if you like variety. The battery-saving options are a bit lackluster and I wish there was a way to preview how the galaxies look (the Alien Shapes live wallpaper did that perfectly). Lastly, the battery consumption of Galaxy Pack is also within reason, it will not destroy your battery % even with all the extra options turned on. Well worth the money, I hope they make a PC version some day.

Figured out how 2 position earth I figured out how to position the earth on the paid version for those having trouble, make sure that-use two fingers to zoom in and out on the last setting tab is checked.Then use two fingers to position the earth anywhere on the screen you want it,spread your fingers apart and back together to zoom in and out to your liking,once it's there set as wallpaper,done! Hope this helps.Support the developer! Real time earth position shadowing moon phase Sun casting Ect.. Would be awesome with this app hint hint!!!

Mr.  Kettler - Well Done I grew up through all of the Apollo Missions by NASA.  Apollo wasn't a faked program, in order to bankrupt Russia in its guise as the Soviet Union.  The USA triumphed, and as an American child - I was proud of my nation.

Improved the quality of my life. Although the title of my rating seems over the top, it's actually true.  This is the best app ever.  I went pro only a few days after trying the free. Wow again. This adds a few extra features that make this even better than the free version. You can move the moon and the earth anywhere, which you couldn't do with the free version. A Perfect Earth Live Wallpaper I've been using for just over a month and I'm pleased to say I have finally found the perfect positioning of the earth which I am able to lock down with the Pro Version; ( When you find a moment please increase &/or provide more options for the city lights on the dark side of the earth.)

Right on the Money @ Small Change! Do yourself a favor and either pay the small change it costs to buy the Pro version or at least install the free version so you can test drive it first. You won't be sorry you've done so and if you're anything like me then you'll forget about spending untold amounts of time and/or small change continually playing around with the wallpaper cause you've quickly become bored with that last one you downloaded and could have sworn it looked better before you installed it. The setup couldn't be easier or quicker, you don't end up killing you're RAM cause you had to install a launcher too just to get the wallpaper, and the design truly brings to life the capabilities of your screen; the same capabilities you paid that extra $100 for when you bought your device so as to have the truer image, but have yet to witness the difference and therefore the value in buying the more equipped device.

Phenomenal Out of all the Earth simulation live wallpapers available on Google Play, this is by far the best in my opinion. It renders beautifully on my HTC One (M7) and looks very realistic if I take a screenshot of it and compare it to a photo of the real thing.  I have one feature request: the ability to increase the maximum distance of the moon's orbit to Earth because how it's displayed here is inaccurate (there's actually much more distance in scale between the two).  Anyway, great app!

Perfect eye candy for my tablet! All I can say is this guy Alexander is good. REAL GOOD with the parallax effects! My 3 year old Samsung tablet was becoming just another boring tablet. This just boosted its coolness factor! Spend the extra $1 to get the extra settings. You won't be dissapointed.

Best wallpaper!! One little hiccup I think this is by far the coolest wallpaper I've come across, but I've found one little flaw... If my phone battery is starting to run low, less than 5% the background goes from planet earth to static, similar to TV static.  The phone continues to operate normally, which is a good thing.  Even if I charge the phone to more 40%, I must restart my phone to reset the background to mother earth once again. Just thought I should share this concern with the creator of this app. My phone Moto x, gen 2, 5.1 OS

Cute does not mean dumbed down! Besides being absolutely adorable in all its little details, including the little animations in the stars or the way birds and cars and whatnot move, it's customizable enough to satify the most mental control freak and keep you entertained for a while just playing around with the endless settings, while having a good selection of pre-made themes if you just want to have a cute wallpaper out of the box. I used to be put off by the permissions, but they're just for the live weather and the moon phases (both of which can be turned off and have a ton of options - everything has a ton of options). It's been my favorite wallpaper for a while and hasn't stopped being so; I always end up coming back to it.  P.S. - I wrote this in 2014. It's 2016 and this still is my wallpaper. Disappointed! This app used to be great when it was free so I didn't mind paying. But now you can no longer finds flights by flight number, only departure and arrival city. Wonderful app! I enjoy the app! It does give real time tracking. I don't know why people give this app bad ratings but all people need to know is the real time status, flight numbers, airports, beginning flight, and destinations. No average person need to know every detail except the things I mentioned above. This app is all people need expecially if your not a tech-savvy person. My guess is mostly those who are not tech-savvy complains about the app.

Upgraded  from the older version when it was on special offer. The UI is improved but that where it ends. Forwarded my EasyJet flight confirmation (an airline that is on there approved list). Got an email back saying unable to update information to the app I would have to add in manually.  I did this by putting in the dates and the flight numbers etc. The departure and arrival times are completely different from the schedule and you are unable to manually amend them (I might add that Tripit had no problems picking up my confirmation email from my inbox and putting the correct information in their app).  Emails to Flight Track support go unanswered, so if you are thinking of upgrading to get all the bells and whistles I would think again.

Unethical developer I bought the Flight Track from Mobiata for 5$ sometime back. They have removed that from the Play store and added this instead - Flight Track 5. I'm not going to keep giving 5$ every time they change their app. It's not like they closed down... I feel it's very unprofessional. I want to also mention that the earlier version was much cleaner and better. The new version seems all cluttered.

Sadly this app is not reliable anymore. Just check one flight that have ben delayed 1h30 and FlightTrack is telling me it is already landed. The airport website and Google both know the update info...  Really not worth the 5$.

Add flight option not streamlined In a single trip, there are two redundant options "Add another flight" at the bottom and a "+" at the top. Both does the same thing. Would be easier when selecting the bottom option to save the new flight in the same trip rather to have to ask me everytime if I wanted to do so. Since you have 2 buttons to add flight, make it easier to use one to continuously add flights in the same trip. Super annoying.
This is trash, unstable and unusable If you pay for something it should work.  Since I purchased this app it hasn't worked.  It no longer open.  It crashes and slows down the phone.

abandoned Mobiata seem to have completely abandoned FlightTrack and FlightBoard, and only keep them around to swindle the odd sale from unlucky folks like myself. Do not buy.

Worked for me Hadn't had any issues. Installed on Note 3 after I had just reset my phone to factory settings. Worked before and after the reset.

The only saving grace is the water droplets which seems pretty good. Unfortunately there is the occasional laggy jump - which on a Nexus 6P is very poor. Sadly I can't even seem to get a refund.

You can't open your camera from the homescreen while this background is in use, so that is a problem. I'm not gonna use this app though, because i'm sure it kills battery.

App doesn't work with older versions of android I've got a LG G Pad 8.3 and this app will not work on it. I keep getting a message that says the app cannot reliably determine my location and thus will not play any live games.
Issue with switching TV feed While casting the game on the TV, the feed will change to the other team's feed after a commercial break. Just started doing that this year.

Sent email detailing audio problems, get uninstall instructions in reply, it's as if they don't care that they if their app functions... 1)  Audio keeps cutting out, regardless of whether or not I use my wireless data connection or wifi through my home Internet connection.  2)  Local blackouts.  Really!?!  No point in paying money for a premium account if I can't watch my favorite team play.  Glad I got mine for free through t-mobile. 3)After sending an email detailing the issues with the audio, I get a reply with instructions on how uninstall the app.

Finally working for most android devices. Guys forget about the blackout issue, this is a major part of the deal with local TV networks. Another complain is why Apple version of the app let you watch multiple games at the same time but is not available for android???

constant buffering Nearly flawless on computer and Samsung phone, but absolute crap when going through chromecast/googlecast to TV. Maddening how much it buffers. I know it's the app because I have zero problems with Netflix, Hulu, Amazon or YouTube.

When watching an archived game, you must get rid of the "Commercial Break in Progress Screen." Is it that difficult to remove those and only have the game? I could watch archived games in an hour without that dumb screen. Instead I gotta wait it out for the game to come back, or fast forward which is an inconvenience because the fast forward/rewind features are not good. Please fix

Good but could use two tweeks Overall a great app love being able to listen live to games on phone. The only thing I would like to see tweked is that the notifications all came under the same header and only a new one pops up if the previous one was removed and also like to see an option of a notification at their end of each inning
Audio keeps cutting out Does a decent job, but once an inning or so it loses the feed for about 20 second.

I love the app, but it doesn't scale correctly on a Nexus Pixel C.  Everything is too tall.  Please fix this by adding in black bars, or even better, but mimicking the IPad app and putting a scoreboard on the bottom of the screen and two slideout stat windows.  Why is this app still worse than the Ipad version from last year?

Solid but needs work The app doesn't seem to update very regularly, especially when you are navigating through it. I also listened to a full game on data when I didn't intend to.  It disconnected from my trucks Bluetooth and the audio want playing so I assumed it stopped, it was still streaming.

Features are great, but doesn't feel polished Same features as last year's offering, yet the application has a frustrating amount of lag while scrolling. The scoreboard list scrolls (almost) smoothly but every other part of the application stutters when scrolling. And it's hasn't been addressed in any of the updates since the start of the season. Installed on a Nexus 6P on software version 6.0.1.

Expect more from a pay app The interface is great, I like how you can look up stats, standing, past scores, all that stuff is great. The video highlights are nice too. But the audio CONSTANTLY cuts out. It's not due to my internet connection, it happens everywhere. I've had this issue on 3 different devices now and frankly, for an app I'm paying for, it's unacceptable. The audio player is outdated and needs to be upgraded.

No "hide scores"? Great app, love the ability to stream games to my Chromecast. However...there's no option to hide scores. Seriously? You're already blacking out my local team, but when I want to go back and watch the condensed game, you show me the score? Boo :( Also, when connected to a Chromecast and you select a Condensed Game notification, it won't load with a "game not available" message...which means I need to go to the videos page of the app which means I've seen the score :(

Blackout still ridiculously used As if MLB isn't making enough cash, due to Blackout policies I have to miss Vin's last year announcing the Dodgers. Rotten bull feces you are, and I'm sure you'll continue to be.

5.1.3 appears to fix the app for Marshmallow. Previous fix: from adb shell: 'settings put secure mock_location 0' addressed the 'unable to reliably verify location' error message under 6.0.1. Bumping review level to 4 stars - need to hold back until testing is consistently seen across all platforms to include the newest OS releases. Good step forward though - thanks.

So many problems this year!! I can't watch a game or listen to a game without constant hiccups and buffering.  This is ridiculous.  Not worth the money. Very disappointing as this app has been great in past years.

Maybe they'll notice in this space At-Bat premium. Best sports app no doubt. One critique is the dearth of stats available and a better roto/fantasy section. Probable pitchers? The content is on the desktop site, no reason it shouldn't be on the paid-for app. Lastly, and I've already written this in the Ballpark app reviews, but pictures from each game during checkin are not being shown when shared on FB & Twitter like in years past. It makes sharing check ins less aesthetically pleasing and complete.

Audio feed network error It was fine for many years, but this year, it's just unacceptable. The audio feed was cut every minute for network error. It's very frustrating. I'm using WiFi. My connection is fine. Please fix it before the season is over. Thank you

Tired of blackouts,  poor audio quality! Used to be excellent on audio. Now it's ridiculous! Constantly cuts out. I have changed nothing on how I stream.  Also, I live 3 hours from my  favorite team and I'm blacked out constantly when they are game of the day. I'm 5 hours from Cincinnati and constantly blacked out there as well. Completely frustrating, blackouts are a joke!

At Bat 2016 update is terrible The 2016 update has rendered this app useless for my Android devices. Support is also terrible. Not supported for Samsung Galaxy Tab S? Seriously? I can watch some of a game and then it will continously freeze so often that I give up watching in frustration. It won't work on my Xperia Z2 either. The list of android tablets supported is about 2 long. Ridiculous. It doesn't work either on cellular connection or via WiFi. I can only use it on my PC by leaving it out of full screen mode. I've reverted back to the old player which is thankfully still available. But I mainly bought my subscription to watch it while travelling to and from work. So I have pretty much wasted the $150 I paid. Given the support I have received via email it is obvious MLB cares nothing for its customers. Oh yes and did I mention that watching a game now uses so much data that I can only watch a handful of games a month where before the update during spring training I was watching 5 games or more a week. 60 fps is nice but I would rather be able to watch more games.

Ads to loud! I've sent in a ticket for this several weeks ago and haven't heard anything. I have to play the radio at full blast to hear the broadcast. Then the ads are twice as loud and I have to turn it down. Very frustrating. If there is no change after this season, I will be unsubscribing.

When it works its great, when it works... Network congestion seems to be really affecting video and audio streaming. App is completely useless Paid money for a subscription.  Yay now I can do exactly what I could do for free on the website . Thank god I paid almost 30 dollars for that lol

No archived audio streams If you want to catch a live game its the best way to do it, notwithstanding blackouts. BUT...Why can't I LISTEN to yesterday's game? Combined with the ridiculous "commercial break" with no good way to skip ahead, really just a bad app... seems lazy with these obvious flaws!

I only have a few things about this app that I don't love.  I hope they can be fixed!!! IOS users get the option to rewind, fast-forward and skip to an area of a game in the app, as well as the option to hide scores so they don't open the app to a spoiler.  Android users get none of these features and I can't understand for the life of me why these features are not available for Android users!  This is a 5 star app otherwise.  I am a premium member going on 5 years and feel like Android users are getting the tail end of things by having these features neglected from the app's updates.  Please take the time to respond, even if it is to tell me why these functions can't be offered for Android users.  Thanks

Poor quality & lacking features I never use the android app as its such poor quality video & there are no features what so ever! Wow I don't normally review apps but this one is phenomenally made. Great interface, streams quickly and with very very few basic visual problems. Love it.

tip top I love the app, especially when I can listen to games just out of broadcast range...I just wish there was a feature to comment on news articles

I'm frustrated and disappointed.

Only complaint now would be the fact the DND is now located on the first swipe down screen.  HUGE problem with this is I find my phone/watch in DND inadvertently all the time.  With the motion sensitivity turning the screen on all the time, and the new wrist flip scrolling, it's very easy to accidentally get put into DND.  Please move that option screen deeper into the selection, to avoid accidental activation.

Easy way to get doctors' answers. Post your question, and a doctor will post an answer. It's fast for a question-answer app. Response times to my questions seem to range from 10 minutes to 10 hours. The site's doctors also have a premium service where you can see a real, live doctor via an eMedicine visit and get a diagnosis and a prescription (but not drugs like narcotics or anxiety drugs). The app is free for posting general medical questions. The one-on-one consultations have a fee.
Comes in handy and works well Helpful, quick, and easy to use app that really helped with some pressing medical questions I had.

B.S. Doesn't work at all. I have very high b.p. along with a high heart rate. For 6 years my heart rate has never been under 115 and higher. Well according to this app. I'm almost dead. I have a heart rate of only 40. Too funny.

Helped my Dr's diagnose an arrhythmia I have been in the hospital on telemetry monitoring & my M.D. was VERY impressed with the accuracy of this app. I have a history of a-fib but suddenly developed episodes of bradycardia that caused my heart rate to drop into the 30's. EKG'S didn't catch it because they only take a "snap shot" of a 12 second window of your heart's activity. 24 hour Holter monitor didn't pick it up because it didn't happen EVERY day. With this app, the Dr was able to SEE what my monitoring hadn't picked up in the hospital!
I rely on the readings daily,  being on beta-blockers with Heart Disease made it a good App to download and try. I have had no problems with it so far plus saving past readings/history is very handy
Dont wanna rate..cause..it doesnt make any sense thar a laser beam can measure heart rate Fake application

The longer it takes, the hotter that light becomes. My longest wait time was just shy of 6 minutes... What happened?

Fast and accurate on note3 You can feel the side of your neck and feel the same beat as your camera is measuring from your finger so anyone can check their accuracy doubts by doing the same with their device

Just an update from my last review below. Walgreens will no longer link to MapMyFitness. I think the MMF app is great. You can check out your history for over a year and you get weekly, monthly, and annual updates as well as occasional "fitness flashbacks" for special achievements, all with the free app. I do think the workout types available have been reduced. Just lately I've been having difficulty with the app pausing and restarting in the middle of a walk. I'm attempting to uninstall and reinstall to see if that helps. Finally, I wish the logout was one easy step from your workout. You have to go back to a menu screen and go all the way to the bottom to find logout. Overall still terrific.  Walgreen's revamped their Balance Rewards for healthy choices and can link with devices and apps, including Map My Fitness that covers everything. I've been using it for over a year and think it's great. They've helped me out when I had problems with the Walgreens sync and I love the weekly feedback. Map just got taken over by Under Armour and I've had problems with the app forgetting my password even after it reset. I just uninstalled.and reinstalled and it was fine but an annoyance.

5 stars for a great application! I use Mapmyride but it's the same thing. DO NOT use any power saving settings on your phone and it will map perfectly. I love that it keeps me informed while I'm working out so I know how many calories, how far etc. I can't say enough good things and I use it for free. I have this connected to Myfitnesspal and my UP3 health band and it all works pretty seamlessly together.

Excellent, the only app you'll need for all your workouts This has been a great app. I like it because I do wide range of exercises and sports, and I like it that I can track all of them with one app as well as record my bike routes and running routes via the GPS feature. Syncs pretty well, although calorie burn doesn't translate well.   I have noticed that fitbit will pick up workouts from this app in real time, but fitbit won't take workouts that are logged after the fact.
Perfect for me I love this app because it makes it easier to track my fitness goals. I am now able to focus on performing at my best rather than keeping times and trying to figure out my speed.
Just started using this app and love it already. No more guessing how I did!
Flexible Connectivity Calorie calculations for a vast array of cardiovascular activities and automatic linkage with My Fitness Pal.
Great app Have been using this mainly for walking but love it. I like when it tells you how far you have fone and the calories you have used.
So far so good Just used it for forst time. Seems pretty accurate
Nice App Gave 4 stars because there's always room for improvement!
If dont have it you gots to get it Tracks distance, time, calories burned, avg speed and elevation changes awesome app
Accurate and easy to use Have used this app for a long time and think it is excellent.  Love how it syncs with my Jawbone Up 3.
Lacking It is very hard to find foods served in restaurants. I always have to use another app to find the foods and value.

Super easy to use. I like that I am becoming aware of the calories I eat. Even if I'm over goal, it teaches you which foods are monopolizing your calorie budget. They have an extensive database of restaurants and their menu items; So, if you eat out, it is easy to find your meal when you aren't able to scan it.
Thumbs Up!!! So far I deleted all of my other weight loss apps and find this app the best. Very organized accurate and motivating.

Ad placement on new update I know you guys need to make your money and I've been using your app since WAY back when you guys first came out and have enjoyed this app immensely, but your ad placement is getting out of hand. Placing an ad on the top of the log page is SO annoying and highly distracting. It also seems to re-load at a pretty constant rate which leads me to think it's using my data unnecessarily. Be creative with your ad placement and not look like you only care about us a revenue source.

Ads / overpriced subscription I've been a user of this app for a long time. I understand the need to monetize, but it's starting to get a bit out of hand. Premium is too expensive, and now there are ads cluttering up the UI. Not a good move.
Great app! It took a little getting used to, but once you get the hang of it this is a great app! It is easy to use & a very effective weight loss tool. I'm already down 29 lbs.

My favorite health app!  It has been very useful to me and my health goals.  I love that you can make recipes that combines ingredients and divides it into servings, helping out the home-cook!  It has an extensive database, part of which is crowd-sourced.  Crowd-sourcing does have its downfalls (sometimes items are inaccurate), but this app compensates by allowing you to edit food details, for instance, after scanning a barcode.  Sometimes it lacks restaurant items, but you can enter a custom item (such as something you looked up on google) and that is good enough for me.  The custom options really make the app!  Besides those benefits, this is the one app I love updating.  The team actually writes what is being improved in the "what's new" section, making it seem like someone actually cares and is working on real problems.  The developers seem to actually listen to complaints and FIX the problems!  Keep up the good work guys!

Better than MFP I definitely find the UI and UX better than MFP. Easier to use, more intuitive, better looking, less obtrusive ads and sponsored content. Only thing missing is Garmin connect communication! Definitely bump up to 5 stars with that functionality.

Great App Love this app. Downloaded after reading bad reviews about weight watchers. It is easy to use and lots of great features. My favorite is the barcode scanner. It makes it easy to add the calories onto my daily log. I also love that I could link my activity tracker to the app. It adds my calories earned from exercise. So great. Download it, you won't regret it. I am thinking that I might purchase the premium app based on how great the free version is.

After 3 attempts to resolve the problem...linking with Google Fit "breaks" the app.  You lose the ability to scan or manually search for foods to enter and the app locks up.  The developers are aware of this, but my last email response stated that they hadn't identified the "glitch" so they can't estimate when it will be resolved and to keep an eye on updates in the Google Play store.  As a paid subscriber that only paid for the sync ability, I'm not happy.  They extended my membership 2 months as compensation, but that was 2 months ago and the app is still not working.  If I have to use an app that won't sync with Google Fit I might as well go back to MyNetDiary since it has far superior Diabetes tracking and reporting.

Good app This app kept me accountable for my 30-lb weight loss, and continues to be the best thing I have done for my health. I like the layout and ease of use, and as a result, I've never lost motivation to log my food everyday.

Love it! This app really keeps you on track.. It's super easy to use and when I do follow it.. I Lose weight! I have recommended it to several friends! I think there are a few minor bugs with sending friend invites and I wish you were able to post pictures in the comment field . especially for the challenges. . All in all.... GREAT APP!

Could be better for android Easy to use food tracker, but doesn't sync with samsung gear, so it doesn't recognize my steps.  Food calorie counts with Android seem off in many cases. Worked much better with my IPhone.

Excellent program After I found how to work with its unfriendly interface I was amazed how powerful is it. There are complete list of foods and dishes including international. Thank you for this awesome software!!!
Love the interface! I used to track calories with MyFitnessPal, but I found the interface on that app cumbersome and difficult to use. I really like the interface on Lose It!
Good app, bad localization for Android. This app is rather intelligent, but fails 3/4 times to let me search up my entries on strong 50 MB WiFi. Please fix.
My last diet i used my fitness pal. These are the best 2 apps for diet control and i suppose it would be personal preference between the two.

Good but errors I cannot change So having to uninstall. Confused, it asked for my weight etc at the startup, once on the app it's telling me I weigh 13kg that's TWO stone so I need to eat 3000 calories a day. I entered the correct weight, it won't let me change it or I can't find an option to do so in all of the settings. If that part was cleared up then sure it seems like a great app with the pie charts and calorie search/goals etc
Buggy This is extremely buggy.  Search doesn't work.  Can't pull up right foods. Repetitive foods and many have different calorie counts.

Love it! I cannot say enough good things about Lose it. I recommend it (highly) to anyone who wants to safely lose weight at a healthy rate. Even the "free" app is pretty darn good if you ask me. Much better than other weight loss/activity tracking apps I have tried. Thanks Lose it!
Keep track and lose as much as you want Love this, I've done well with this app. Gonna go strong again!

Not quite as user friendly as other aps I've been using Noom for about a year,  and functionality of the two aps are nearly identical. I tried LoseIt as it works with the Microsoft Band 2. However, LoseIt is a far chunkier UI (compared to Noom) and it's food item search is intolerably slow,  both with on line wifi and offline. On the plus side,  it's recipes are better, and it's integration with the Microsoft health service strong.

Half done I dont need to lose weight i need to gain it i like the food tracking portion of this app but unfortunately it isnt geared towards my health goals of gaining weight hopefully you guys consider not everyone is over weight some people are on the opposite side of the spectrum

Works for me! But... This app has been useful to me for two years+ in logging food. However...now less user-friendly, more complicated to enter foods and barcode button located too close to other feature. Using Android on phone.

Incorrect information Has nice some features. Soon as I downloaded I scanned several items in my kitchen...unfortunately it was incorrect on the calories on several items, and not by a small amount. Being several hundred calories off in a diet app makes it hard to trust.

Great! I love that you can use the barcode to log calories....what I would love to tweak, would be logging excersise calories burned, because there is a differnce in your number to what I abctually burn. I would love it if you were able to change the number and allow you to type in notes like cardio trainer app. I went from a 4 star to a 3 star due to me switching from a fitbit to a Garmin Vivofit HR and lose it does not sync with Garmin products, super dissapointing.

Great App but it's frustratingly slow at times I switched from Myfitnesspal app to this. I like it overall but when searching the food database, I find it to be way too slow. There should be an option to download the food database to the app and for it to update the cached database automatically. This would speed up searches greatly and I believe fix my issues.

Not accurate always Sometimes when I log food it doesn't add it to my daily total and says I have eaten less calories than I have. For example yesterday it only counted my breakfast even though I logged lunch and dinner and snacks
Great app!!!! I lost some weight with this but i ended up regainingit all back when i uninstalled it
Easy etc.  Wish they hadn't gone with prime paid features though.
Samsung Gear Will Lose It ever be able to sync with the Samsung Gear? That's is the activity tracker I use. And it would be great if I could use 1 app.
Plz i want the full apps make it free i mean the options of pro the fre version is just a joke plz i give u 5star to improve it just a little bit like pro thx alot
Great Best app like this out there! Really easy to use and very helpful.
Won't let me upgrade I've been trying to upgrade to.premium however all it does is say loading...foreverrr. I sat there 30mins with it saying loading. Closed out restarted same thing.
Love the app,  want to upgrade and it just says "loading" forever!
love it, this app has helped me tremendously on how to eat in portions.

Lost 45lbs so far Information is power and "Lose It" gives you power to make weight loss easier. Thousands of items are already in their database waiting for you to pull up and log in(or enter custom foods) Set a weight loss target and Lose it will give you a daily calorie budget to meet that goal. Enter your calories burned off by exercise and get credit to eat more (or not and lose faster). Buy the premium upgrade and link your favored exercise tracking device and "Lose It" will automatically update your calories burned.

New update Not a fan of the new update. I've been using the app for 4 years now and found it easily accessible . You could pull it out and quickly log your meal in before anybody saw you. (I didn't like my friends knowing that I worried about my weight). Since the update, the app tends to lag and it takes longer to log in. I love the app and hope they address the issue.
Too big widthwise for device, no way to add what I'm eating to log.
Good Stuff Super easy to navigate with a huge database of foods to choose from. Also, whoever types the script for "What's New" in the Play Store is absolutely hilarious.

Awesome app! As a working mother, i have no time for workouts.. coz too busy with juggling with kids, housework and my job. So this app helps me to be able to exercise even if its 5mins.. i just switch on what i felt like doing like cardio.. and wala.. everything complete in 5 mins. Totally recommended for busy people. :)
Frozen It's constantly freezing the videos either won't play or won't show while playing.  I was really looking forward to using this app but I'll have to remove it since it does not work

GREAT WORKOUTS. REALLY WORKS! I LOVE THIS APP! I supplement Sworkit with jogging, walking and gym. I wake up and turn on my app. I really sweat and my muscles ache next day. I also learned new exercises. I REALLY REALLY recommend this app!

The burn means it's working I have been working out on my own for some months, but this app is a nice way to break up my routine and give it some variation. I like that I can focus on different things and it helps me specifically work towards my goals.

So many bugs 1 month ago, the app opened so much faster as compared to now. The current version is TERRIBLY SLOW, and it's just this app. In addition, why is it that the iOS version has the 100% music volume option but Google Play version doesn't????? This is WAY TOO MUCH

Love I love the app, and I use it quite a bit. This app helps you be in shape, while being motivated. The only thing I'd change is have a few workouts for free, and then the rest cost money, because the pre-made ones that are longer, tell them I like to do but some of them I wouldn't so I'd like a few of them to be free.
Great workout Able to customize your workout. Very short intervals so the time goes by fast. Easy to follow along to while, I workout while I watch my TV shows. Very easy to use, no annoying ads.

I wish i could rate 5 stars I love this app except when I am in the middle of a workout the screen will go black so I cannot see how to do the next exercise. If that issue gets resolved I would love to come back and redo my rating.
It freezes I used it for the first time which worked perfectly fine, but then the second time I tried to use it. It won't just play the workout. Please fix this issue. Thanks.
Nice customabilty and its easy to use the quick pace really makes me feel like im getting a good workout even in a short amount of time

Convenient I can do a quick workout anytime of the day or a long workout when I'm at home. Best thing is it does not require any equipment. If you are looking to get bulky then this is not for you, but to stay lean and fit, then it's the way to go.
Helpful app The app is very good.  I like it because it uses a variety of exercises instead of just boring you with limited exercises.  It really does make you sweat

I love this While I'm watching TV I can get a work out in to feel a little less guilty about watching tv. It's great that I have to pay no attention to my ohone, just listen to the voice. Perfect for everyone!

Fix your pricing model! You must be kidding me! $5 a month for this? I had the upgraded version on iOS and now I moved to Android, so I have to pay monthy? All I want is a decent workout without annoying voice to ask me to upgrade everytime. This is useless.

Absolutely love it I love it it lets me know when I should work out again every day and I hated working out before this app but truly I'm in love with what my body is becoming my arms are getting stronger I'm losing weight like I wanted to and I'm getting fit personally if you're looking for an app get this one you won't regret it
One of the best Amazing app so many work out for different things differently one of the best
Just one problem. Otherwise best app. In India we can't download Spotify. It'd be a bless if you let us play our own playlist.
Very good app Just a bit laggy on my xperia z3 and power hog too. customer service is top notch even for free user.

The best I have never wrote a feedback on any application, but I couldn't help myself. This is the best ever; very easy to use, helps fit in a 5-minute workout, very encouraging and entertaining. I love it. If only you could add an option that enables participants to work on any specific body part they want. Thank you for such an amazing application.
Love this app This is so helpful when I don't have time to go to the gym or just prefer to stay home. There are so many options and they show you exactly how to do each excersize.
Works well and is fun I am lazy, but this makes it fun to work out as little as 5 minutes at a time if that's all I'm willing to do.

It pretty good I would give it a 5 star but is missing some back and bicep excersices like pull-ups, etc,  I've the basic version as I just started using it and think very good and has much of the possible things you can do without a gym or equipment

Needs to work in background While I find the workouts are great, this app needs to work with the screen off. It so burns the battery down and heats up the phone, that my sweat literally evaporates when it falls on my phone.
Take No excuse for fitness app ! Beginning with the app, definitely a motivation...love the flexibility and simplicity in the design of the exercise regimes...absolute pro!!!
Best ever!! Love the way it is set up! Love that it keeps track of my workouts and encourages me.  Love it!!!

Repetitive I love the idea of this app but I HATE how redundant it is. I can do a 10 minute workout and get the same exercise 4 times! It needs some more variety. The sample size they pick exercises from is just too small.

Heats my phone Good workout app but heats my phone battery right up, slows my phone right down, which is a problem when it stops Google play music (on random occasions), and then  finishes my workout (as if never started) when I leave the app to restart my music
Has stopped functioning Love the app but cannot get past the workout time screen since the cynogen mod marshmallow update for the one plus one. Will change to a 5 star once this is resolved
Great motivation! With this app I have no more excuses for not working out. I can do it from anywhere!

Most comprehensive at home workout app With over 200 exercises, dozens of routines to choose from, and being able to custom design your own routines and times, I felt like a kid in a candy store. The reason I gave it only 4 stars is because it doesn't allow for continuous music play during the workouts.  For example, whenever the app transitions to a new exercise, background music would be paused, which is very frustrating. The upgrades to the app still hasn't addressed this. Otherwise, the app is excellent.
30 second intervals only on free version The only interval you get on the free app is 30 second intervals.  This is great for cardio but not for building muscle.

Easy to use Clear direction for pilates.   Assumes some level of knowledge on the free  level.  The English  woman's  accent is rather clipped and school marmish...not a massive fan but probably  in the minority.  App ux is intuitive
Sworkit Brilliant app! Just started using it and so far can't fault it, Many thanks!
Love it Pretty dope app because it gives you 5 minute workouts which I use in sequence at the gym.

Sooo much in love   I've tried out all apps of this type but trust me this is the best one. Others try to charge you for each video or some don't even have videos. This app has no bullshit. Direct workouts. No other means of wasting time.. I am so much in love with this. Highly recommended!  GREAT JOB DEVELOPERS! KEEP UPDATING NEW WORKOUTS

Brilliant for busy people! I'm trying to build lots of productive new habits to improve my life.
